item.title: Learning Rust Series: Code organization
item.description: Learning Rust Series: Code organization Prerequisites: I am hoping you have Cargo and Rust installed. If not, head to the Guide. In this series, I will be explaining things that I come across on my Rust learning journey. This is the first installment of the Random Rust Series which will cover code organization in rust, which is different from other languages. Code organization is an interesting topic. Whenever I start learning a new language, this is the first thing that I look at.
